tool.name: Convert GEBV output
tool.description: to be compatible with scatter plot

param.name: input
param.label: GEBV output file
param.help: Prediction file must be obtained from GEBV prediction with several traits/environnements

tool.help:

**ConvertGEBVoutput**
-----
This tool converts the output from GEBV prediction tool.
